soc_xwr18xx.c File Reference

This is the XWR18xx Platform specific wrapper for the SOC module. More...

#include <stdint.h>
#include <string.h>
#include <ti/drivers/soc/soc.h>
#include <ti/common/sys_common.h>
#include <ti/drivers/soc/include/soc_internal.h>
#include <ti/drivers/osal/DebugP.h>

Macros

#define SOC_TRANSLATEADDR_NUM_ENTRIES   4
 This defines the number of LUT entries for address translation. The contiguous address ranges are consolidated as much as possible to limit the time spent in lookup actions.

Detailed Description

This is the XWR18xx Platform specific wrapper for the SOC module.
